document.full_text: mitt romney opposed bailing out the auto industry in 2008 and 2009. but now that general motors and chrysler have returned to profitability, he says the president's plan was based on his own.
document.title: refighting the auto industry bailout battle
lines_and_colors: mitt romney opposed bailing out the auto industry in 2008 and 2009. but now that general motors and chrysler have returned to profitability, he says the president's plan was based on his own.
